name: Grand Shooter
description:
Grand Shooter is the reinvention of the Light Gun Shooter genre, from old school arcades to modern devices.

STORYLINE

The player takes control of Joan, an ex-military who is dragged to a much more personal war when Elliot, Joan’s girlfriend, is kidnapped by a mysterious enemy force. She must chase the culprits through a paradisiac island and save her girlfriend.

INNOVATION

With its roots in classic games from the 90s like Virtua Cop 2 and Time Crisis, Grand Shooter innovates by bringing a big variety of guns for players to use, such as pistols, rifles, shotguns and machineguns.

MORE THAN 60 MISSIONS!

Get along Joan in her chase for Elliot, defeating the enemies in her way and watching out for civilians. Each main mission tells a part of the whole story, unraveling its secrets and getting close to rescue her girlfriend.

Are you brave enough to get to the bottom of this?

ANDROID

We have a free-to-play version on Google Play containing the same missions, but using other ways to monetize. The current Itch version is free of ads, in-app purchases and energy system, allowing the player to enjoy the game without any constraint.
